Reference

Data classes

ip_address() is_ip_address() as_ip_address() as.character(<ip_address>) format(<ip_address>)

Vector of IP addresses

ip_network() is_ip_network() as_ip_network() as.character(<ip_network>) format(<ip_network>)

Vector of IP networks

ip_interface() is_ip_interface() as_ip_interface() as.character(<ip_interface>) format(<ip_interface>)

Vector of IP interfaces

Other representations

ip_to_integer() integer_to_ip()

Represent address as integer

ip_to_bytes() bytes_to_ip()

Represent address as raw bytes

ip_to_binary() binary_to_ip()

Represent address as binary

ip_to_hostname() hostname_to_ip()

Translate address to/from hostname

Address space

is_ipv4() is_ipv6()

Version of the address space

max_prefix_length()

Size of the address space

is_private() is_global() is_multicast() is_unspecified() is_reserved() is_loopback() is_link_local() is_site_local()

Reserved addresses

is_ipv4_mapped() is_6to4() is_teredo() extract_ipv4_mapped() extract_6to4() extract_teredo_server() extract_teredo_client()

IPv6 transition mechanisms

ip_operators

Operators for IP addresses

Network membership

network_address() broadcast_address() num_addresses()

Network size

prefix_length() netmask() hostmask()

Network mask

common_network()

Find the common network of two addresses

summarize_address_range()

List constituent networks of an address range

is_within() is_within_any()

Network membership of addresses

is_supernet() is_subnet() overlaps()

Network membership of other networks

supernet() subnets()

Traverse the network hierarchy

Generating addresses

sample_ipv4() sample_ipv6() sample_network()

Sample random addresses

seq(<ip_network>) hosts()

List addresses within a network
